channel.title: Need help
channel.description: I got a question. How do i chain the xp that ppl gain if they train on a dummy or a statue ? Cuz if they hit the dummy on my source they are lvl 58 in 1 hit :confused: pls help me. Thx.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2007, 04:20:37 PM[/size][hr]any 1 ??
